upgradeInfos.name: Bigger Size
upgradeInfos.description: Bigger explosion.

upgradeInfos.name: Sharpened Edges
upgradeInfos.description: Increase base damage by 20%.

upgradeInfos.name: A Taste Of Cheating
upgradeInfos.description: Higher chance of getting a 6 than any other number.

upgradeInfos.name: Cheat Master
upgradeInfos.description: Even higher chance of getting a 6!

upgradeInfos.name: The Magic Three
upgradeInfos.description: When the dice reaches 3, create a huge damaging explosion.

upgradeInfos.name: Compacted Snowball
upgradeInfos.description: Hardened snowball, slightly increase base damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Never lose a fight
upgradeInfos.description: Hugely increase the aim of the snowball.

upgradeInfos.name: Grow Bigger
upgradeInfos.description: Snowballs can get bigger, dealing more damage and with a larger radius.

upgradeInfos.name: Chilling Snow
upgradeInfos.description: The snowball applies Frozen buff, slowing the target and increase their damage received.

upgradeInfos.name: Composite Materials
upgradeInfos.description: Using composite materials, snowballs can cause extensive damage to the terrain.

upgradeInfos.name: Rusty but Pointy
upgradeInfos.description: Slightly increase base damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Aerodynamic Design
upgradeInfos.description: The anvil can be launched further.

upgradeInfos.name: Earth-shaking Strikes
upgradeInfos.description: If anvil is falling straight down, it will make a much bigger terrain damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Slam it Hard
upgradeInfos.description: While falling, click a second time to further boost its speed and damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Smash to Dizziness
upgradeInfos.description: If the anvil is falling straight down, it will stun the target, making it unable to move for one turn.

upgradeInfos.name: Good Catch
upgradeInfos.description: Boomerang does no self-damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Lightweight Boomerangs
upgradeInfos.description: Made with carbon-based materials. Can be thrown further.

upgradeInfos.name: Sharp Boomerangs
upgradeInfos.description: Boomerangs have sharp blades installed, doing much more damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Remote-controlled Boomerangs
upgradeInfos.description: Click while in mid-air to slightly change the direction of the boomerang.

upgradeInfos.name: Self-tracking Boomerangs
upgradeInfos.description: Click while in mid-air to recall the boomerang at a much higher speed and increased damage.

upgradeInfos.name: 8X Scope
upgradeInfos.description: Use this optical sight to aim farther.

upgradeInfos.name: Explosive Bullets
upgradeInfos.description: Sniper bullets explode on contact, and have the ability to destroy terrain.

upgradeInfos.name: Headshot
upgradeInfos.description: Chance to cause headshot and deal more damage.

upgradeInfos.name: 15X Scope
upgradeInfos.description: Aim extremely far.

upgradeInfos.name: Marksman
upgradeInfos.description: Just go for the head.

upgradeInfos.name: Scopes On The Shotgun
upgradeInfos.description: Aim farther with the shotgun.

upgradeInfos.name: Improved Bullets
upgradeInfos.description: Each bullet shot deals more damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Tactical Shotgun
upgradeInfos.description: Tactical shotgun capable of long-range combats with less bullet dispersion.

upgradeInfos.name: Bring It To Five!
upgradeInfos.description: Shoots five bullets instead of three.

upgradeInfos.name: Born To Be Destructive
upgradeInfos.description: Low bullet dispersion, high explosion radius for all bullets.

upgradeInfos.name: Metal Inside
upgradeInfos.description: Slight increase in base damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Big Burner
upgradeInfos.description: Explosion Radius increased by 30%.

upgradeInfos.name: Smelting Temperature
upgradeInfos.description: DOUBLE the burn damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Eternal Fire
upgradeInfos.description: Burns forever (almost).

upgradeInfos.name: Rain of Fire
upgradeInfos.description: While the fireball is in the air, create smaller fireballs that go straight down.

upgradeInfos.name: Lighter Materials
upgradeInfos.description: The bounce ball can be launched further.

upgradeInfos.name: Bouncier
upgradeInfos.description: The ball bounces three times, with a slight increase in bounce damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Destructive Rubber
upgradeInfos.description: Destroys terrains while bouncing.

upgradeInfos.name: Ultimate Bounciness
upgradeInfos.description: The ball can bounce five times. Damage increases while bouncing.

upgradeInfos.name: Kinetic Energy Storage
upgradeInfos.description: Stores kinetic energy for every bounce, dealing extremely high damage for the final blast.

upgradeInfos.name: Death's Precision
upgradeInfos.description: You aim more precisely with the curse bomb.

upgradeInfos.name: Death's Reach
upgradeInfos.description: The curse bomb can be launched further.

upgradeInfos.name: Death's Rage
upgradeInfos.description: Increase the range of effect.

upgradeInfos.name: Death's Call
upgradeInfos.description: 'Cursed' debuff lasts one turn less.

upgradeInfos.name: Death's Explosion
upgradeInfos.description: Affected targets explodes upon death.

upgradeInfos.name: More Bandages
upgradeInfos.description: Effect radius increased.

upgradeInfos.name: Advanced Med-Kit
upgradeInfos.description: Increases Healing Amount.

upgradeInfos.name: First Aid
upgradeInfos.description: The Med Kit has a very low chance of completely healing the target.

upgradeInfos.name: Best Medical Supplies
upgradeInfos.description: Has a higher chance of completely healing you.

upgradeInfos.name: Continuous Healing
upgradeInfos.description: Besides healing you instantly, the Med Kit also applies a Healing Buff that heals you over time.

upgradeInfos.name: Steel Core
upgradeInfos.description: Increased base damage.

upgradeInfos.name: 'It Still Counts'
upgradeInfos.description: The core of the spiky ball does not disappear upon activation. It will fall straight down and deal base damage to the target.

upgradeInfos.name: Eight Directions
upgradeInfos.description: Spiky ball spawns eight spikes in 8 directions.

upgradeInfos.name: So Many Spikes
upgradeInfos.description: 12 Spikes, 12 Directions.

upgradeInfos.name: Lethal Spikes
upgradeInfos.description: Spikes have double damage and explosion radius.

upgradeInfos.name: Spatial Manipulation
upgradeInfos.description: Increases the range at which players can create portals, allowing longer-distance teleportation.

upgradeInfos.name: Platinum Coating
upgradeInfos.description: Increase the base damage of portal ball by 25%

upgradeInfos.name: Radioactive Portals
upgradeInfos.description: The portals themselves deal damage to nearby targets.

upgradeInfos.name: Mirror Dimension
upgradeInfos.description: Opens a portal to the mirror dimension, and spawn a devastating portal ball instead.

upgradeInfos.name: Full Control of Space and Time
upgradeInfos.description: No teleportation limits.

upgradeInfos.name: Larger Cubes
upgradeInfos.description: Increase explosion Radius by 20%.

upgradeInfos.name: Stainless Steel
upgradeInfos.description: Moderate chance of dealing critical damage on hit.

upgradeInfos.name: Titanium Cube
upgradeInfos.description: Great increase in damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Adamantium Core
upgradeInfos.description: Destroy enemies with this special, but insanely heavy alloy. Also destroys metal tiles.

upgradeInfos.name: Splitting Cube
upgradeInfos.description: The cube splits into four smaller pieces on hit.

upgradeInfos.name: Extended Reach
upgradeInfos.description: Increase the range and aim of the star.

upgradeInfos.name: Celestial Precision
upgradeInfos.description: Makes it easier to draw the star shape, enhancing the chances of empowerment.

upgradeInfos.name: Cosmic Enhancement
upgradeInfos.description: Enhances the power of the empowered star.

upgradeInfos.name: Nova Genesis
upgradeInfos.description: Further amplifies the empowerment of the star, turning it into a radiant nova upon impact.

upgradeInfos.name: Comet Cascade
upgradeInfos.description: The star sens shockwaves through the air while drawing the star shape, damaging nearby targets.

upgradeInfos.name: SawStop
upgradeInfos.description: The blade will stop instantly if it touches the shooter, dealing no damage its shooter.

upgradeInfos.name: Reinforced Structure
upgradeInfos.description: Increases the durability and sharpness of the saw blade, increasing its damage and making it travel farther.

upgradeInfos.name: Precision Deployment
upgradeInfos.description: Hugely improve the range of accuracy of saw blades.

upgradeInfos.name: Relentless Fury
upgradeInfos.description: Damaging an enemy refreshes the timer for the saw blade's roll-forward action, allowing it to continue its relentless assault on foes without interruption.

upgradeInfos.name: Shredder Storm
upgradeInfos.description: The saw blades explode upon impact with an enemy, releasing smaller saw blades that goes in different directions.

upgradeInfos.name: Contagious Vector
upgradeInfos.description: Increases the radius of the de-buff spread upon expiration.

upgradeInfos.name: Viral Expansion
upgradeInfos.description: Increase the range and explosion radius of the virus projectile.

upgradeInfos.name: Viral Amplification
upgradeInfos.description: Enhances the damage of the DoT effect inflicted by the de-buff.

upgradeInfos.name: Pandemic Dominance
upgradeInfos.description: Radius of de-buff spread is significantly expanded. Chance to spread the virus on every turn.

upgradeInfos.name: Lethal Contagion
upgradeInfos.description: The viral pathogen evolves into a lethal contagion. Infected enemies have a chance to succumb to the lethal infection, causing instant death.

upgradeInfos.name: Tropical Expansion
upgradeInfos.description: The coconut seed reaches further.

upgradeInfos.name: Enhanced Impact
upgradeInfos.description: Slight increase in the damage dealt by the coconuts.

upgradeInfos.name: Nutrient Enrichment
upgradeInfos.description: The coconut tree grows one more coconut.

upgradeInfos.name: Coconut Ice Bomb
upgradeInfos.description: The coconuts inflict frozen de-buff to targets, slowing them down and leaving them vulnerable to further attacks.

upgradeInfos.name: Fruity Barrage
upgradeInfos.description: The coconut tree grows four coconuts in total, doubling the offensive capabilities of the weapon.

upgradeInfos.name: Fresh From The Fridge
upgradeInfos.description: Higher base damage for the Ice Cube.

upgradeInfos.name: Ice Weakening
upgradeInfos.description: The frozen de-buff increases incoming damage by 30%.

upgradeInfos.name: Go Frosty
upgradeInfos.description: Ice Cube completely immobilize targets.

upgradeInfos.name: Permafrost
upgradeInfos.description: The frozen de-buff lasts forever (almost).

upgradeInfos.name: Cold & Fragile
upgradeInfos.description: The de-buff lasts longer while incoming damage is increased even further.

upgradeInfos.name: Amplified Beats
upgradeInfos.description: Upgrades the boombox's speakers to enhance the intensity and range of the shockwave.

upgradeInfos.name: Resonance Resupply
upgradeInfos.description: Increases the number of shockwave charges available.

upgradeInfos.name: Sonic Projection
upgradeInfos.description: Hugely increase the range of both the projectile and shockwaves.

upgradeInfos.name: Concussion Beats
upgradeInfos.description: Empowers the Bass Blaster Boombox with the ability to activate multiple times in quick succession, but with reduced range and damage.

upgradeInfos.name: Sonic Singularity
upgradeInfos.description: The boombox focuses its power into a single, condensed shockwave of immense force.

upgradeInfos.name: Larger Service Area
upgradeInfos.description: Increases the distance that the jackhammer can be launched, allowing it to hit targets further away.

upgradeInfos.name: Reinforced Bit
upgradeInfos.description: Enhances the durability and power of the jackhammer's bit, increasing the damage it deals upon impact and while drilling.

upgradeInfos.name: Deeper Down
upgradeInfos.description: The jackhammer digs deeper down, destroying more terrain.

upgradeInfos.name: Earthquake Trigger
upgradeInfos.description: The jackhammer has a change to trigger an Earthquake, damaging all entities standing on the ground.

upgradeInfos.name: Bifurcated Dig
upgradeInfos.description: The jackhammer digs down in two different directions upon impact, creating two separate tunnels that deal damage and disrupt terrain in a wider area.

upgradeInfos.name: Flexible Orb
upgradeInfos.description: Increases the range of the Yin-Yang orb.

upgradeInfos.name: Amplified Light
upgradeInfos.description: Increases the damage and radius of the white sphere.

upgradeInfos.name: Darkness Expanded
upgradeInfos.description: Further Increases the radius of the black sphere.

upgradeInfos.name: A Harmony
upgradeInfos.description: Allows the orb to split into both a white and a black sphere simultaneously when activated.

upgradeInfos.name: The One that was Left Over
upgradeInfos.description: Spawns the other sphere with random velocity upon impact.
